alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:36PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Prowers, Baca and southeastern Bent Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 133 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking developing strong thunderstorms in the vicinity of northern Baca County. These storms are nearly stationary, and will be capable of producing heavy rainfall, gusty winds, and landspout tornadoes. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Walsh, Pritchett, Vilas, Two Buttes, Two Buttes Reservoir and Stonington. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
